title: Plutarch on How To Be A Leader
description:
Today’s episode features an excerpt from Jeffrey Beneker’s How To Be A Leader: An Ancient Guide to Wise Leadership. How To Be A Leader is a modern translation and collection of essays about successful leadership from the ancient biographer.

✉️  Sign up for the Daily Stoic email: https://dailystoic.com/dailyemail
